title: Luca Danese
text: I am a PhD student in Statistics at the Department of Economics, Management and Statistics of University of Milano-Bioccca. My main interest lies in Bayesian statistics, particularly the methodological and computational aspects.

title: Luca Danese
text:
Publications
Preprints

Corradin R., Danese L., Ongaro A., KhudaBukhsh W. R. (2024+). Model-based clustering of time-dependent observations with common structural chang. [ArXiv]

Articles in referred journals

Corradin, R., Danese, L., Ongaro, A. (2022). Bayesian nonparametric change points detection for multivariate time series with missing observations. International Journal of Approximate Reasoning. [Link]

Discussions and conference proceedings

Corradin R., Danese L., KhudaBukhsha W., Ongaro A. (2023). Model-based clustering of nonstationary time series with common historical change times. Proceedings of 2023 Conference of the Italian Statistical Society.

title: Luca Danese
text:
Software
